Small Tabs Chicago

Neighborhoods Find a Bar Promote Your Bar Sign In

Featured Tuesday Special:

Finley Dunne's Tavern

3458 N Lincoln Ave, Lakeview

Finley Dunne's Tavern was established in 1996 and remains one of the most popular neighbor bars in the Paulina Station area of Lakeview in Chicago. The Tavern serves a wide array of neighborhood guests and groups. It has become a destination spot for many who want to enjoy the great staff, large beer selection, and our Famous “Ryan Burger”.

  • $7 Domestic Pitchers, $3 Miller Lite Bottles, $4 Four Rebels Lion Bombs
  • $10 8 Chicken Wings & 2 Miller Lite Bottles, $25 20 Chicken Wings & 5 Miller Lite Bottles
  • Sports Bar

Find specials near or far:
